title: The House of Kuragin
description: A swirling novel of danger and passion in Russia under the Czar. Stunning, swashbuckling, romantic!Sweeping from the gambling halls of St. Petersburg to the opulent ballrooms of Russian country estates, here is a powerful tale of desire and betrayal woven from the glittering fabric of pre-Revolutionary Russian life protagonized by the young Amarylis.
author: Constance Heaven
